casebody.data:
Tuesday, February 3, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

97-2564. State v. Martin.

Shelby App. No. 17-97-14. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and a claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay and bond,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay and bond be, and hereby is, denied.
